response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. We are offering this extraordinary item to you at a special price of $1,100,000, considering the significant benefits it will bring to your endeavors. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive unparalleled value while also maximizing our return on investment. I look forward to discussing the details and understanding how we can collaborate to make this transaction beneficial for both parties.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
